Name: Shard VI
Desc: Generates magical shards that fly towards enemies. Does not deal damage to you when attacking an enemy in reflect status.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 30, create 5 Magic Fragments that deal 720% damage 3 times.
Cooldown: 6 sec
H.New:
MP Cost: 30. Creates 5 magic fragments that attack at 720% Damage 3 times.
Cooldown: 6 sec.
